desc: Built by a team of budtenders, growers, academics and enthusiasts Stash is a thoughtful, beautiful take on the best of the Canadian cannabis landscape. Stash combines stunning macrophotography, visual art and authentic, in-depth writing for a truly unique experience. This hardcover, quarterly lookbook will keep you on

layout.text: In the spring of 2021 Daniel Saez filed a civil lawsuit against OGEN Ltd. It is the third time a former employee has sued the company for wrongful dismissal. We collected dozens of hours of interviews, court filings and ownership information to help describe the working environment at OGEN. Our findings are contained in our latest release: Volume 3.
